description: Defines the application's theme configuration for a Flutter project, including color schemes, gradients, and widget styles.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: Contains static color definitions and theme data configurations for the Flutter app.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured for light mode, incorporating color scheme, AppBar, Card, InputDecoration, ElevatedButton, Chip, TabBar, and Divider themes.
